byline.contributor: Michael D. Shear reported from Washington, and Maggie Haberman from New York.
byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and MAGGIE HABERMAN

abstract: Donald Trump calls United States Supreme Court Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg disgrace to court and demands she apologize after interview in which she voiced harsh criticism of his candidacy; legal experts call Ginsberg's criticism unwise and inappropriate, saying such comments could potentially damage court's integrity.

headline.print_headline: Trump Calls Ginsburg ‘a Disgrace to the Court’
headline.main: Donald Trump Calls Ruth Bader Ginsburg’s Remarks a ‘Disgrace to the Court’

snippet: Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg of the Supreme Court was rebuked by Donald J. Trump for voicing comments against him that he said were “beneath the court.”...
lead_paragraph: Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg of the Supreme Court was rebuked by Donald J. Trump for voicing comments against him that he said were “beneath the court.”
